程序包 Entity

类 Projectile

java.lang.Object
Entity.Entity
Entity.Projectile
直接已知子类:
OBJ_Fireball
public class Projectile
extends Entity
This subclass inherits the attributes and methods from the Entity class is for initializing player properties.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Projectile

      public Projectile​(GamePanel gp)
      This method is constructor of Projectile class.
      参数:
      gp - GamePanel object.

  • 方法详细资料

    • set

      public void set​(int worldX, int worldY, java.lang.String direction, boolean alive, Entity user)
      This method is for setting properties of projectile.
      参数:
      worldX - x-axis of game.
      worldY - y-axis of game.
      direction - projectile direction.
      alive - available of shooting projectile.
      user - user of projectile.

    • update

      public void update()
      This method is for setting projectile shooting and damage.
      覆盖:
      update 在类中 Entity
